reviews.review: Having never played Portal before, I can confirm that all the fuss about these games are well deserved. Its a great game and is an absolute bargain when it goes on sale. Pick it up if you haven't already, you won't regret it.
This is one of the best puzzle games I have ever played
guys there is definitely no cake within this game none at all it is a gluten free game
Short but really fun, the humour is on point.
The game's really good but if you can afford Portal 2, play that instead

This game is very fun and not expensive.

Portal es un juego lanzado el 9 de octubre de 2007, un resumen general es escapar de las pruebas puestas por GLaDOS mediante nuestro viaje por estas en aperture cience con el fin de conseguir una prometida "torta selva negra" por la misma.
   Es un juego muy memorable debido a su musica,ambientacion,personajes,debido a su fraze "The Cake is a lie"  y mecanicas inovadoras para su epoca.
  En conclusion Portal merece la pena ser revisitado o ser comprado para tu primera experiencia.
Pew Pew Portals and Cake yay
This is a great and short puzzle game worth its price with its sound track and level design its a grate fun to play
its portal youve played i its great
It's damn Portal, what more needs to be said than It's awesome and you should play it if you haven't already, it's nearly always at 90% off in steam sales so PICK IT UP!
Not bad. Incredibly short though worth it in a super steam sale (I got this for 53p) so for the 2 hours it lasted it was OK.

I enjoy the puzzle mechanics and the fact that there is a PORTAL GUN. It's so cool that it's literally the future in the past(You probably don't know that it's set in 1997). The song "Still Alive" is very moving and funny for me. Over all, it is a great game and  recommend it to anyone who likes puzzle games.
